Browse the source code of qv2ray/3rdparty/QNodeEditor/include/nodes/internal/memory.hpp

1#pragma once
2#include <memory>
3#include <utility>
4namespace QtNodes
5{
6 namespace detail
7 {
8#if (!defined(_MSC_VER) && (__cplusplus < 201300)) || (defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER < 1800))
9 //_MSC_VER == 1800 is Visual Studio 2013, which is already somewhat C++14
10 // compilant,
11 // and it has make_unique in it's standard library implementation
12 template<typename T, typename... Args>
13 std::unique_ptr<T> make_unique(Args &&... args)
14 {
15 return std::unique_ptr<T>(new T(std::forward<Args>(args)...));
16 }
17#else
18 template<typename T, typename... Args>
19 std::unique_ptr<T> make_unique(Args &&... args)
20 {
21 return std::make_unique<T>(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
22 }
23#endif
24 } // namespace detail
25} // namespace QtNodes
26
